item.description:
What better way to celebrate the "May Fair" in Harvard Square...during "Patios in Bloom"
May Fair features over 30 live bands and entertainment with local talent performing on two stages. Enjoy & participate inside walk chalk drawing. Rain date in May 16th

for more info go to site
12:00PM We will gather on the sidewalk, just outside of Charlie's Beer garden on the corner of Eliot and Winthrop. We will tour the Fair for 2.5 hours.... longer if we decide to stay listening to a great band.
Between 2:30- 2:45 PM We will end at Charlie's Beer Garden again.

3:00 PM Enjoy a draft beer al fresco at Legal Seafood patio bar which is across the street from Charlie's Kitchen & Beer Garden, located just outside the Charles Hotel for wine, cocktails and beer plus light fare menu, including full raw bar.
item.name: Cambridge May Fair
